name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Halo/How Are You'.
Scene transition with a black screen.
MC section where Matsuri reflects on the previous songs and puts on a crown.
Performance of the song 'World is Mine'.

subtitles.original: なんて面倒くさい生き物でしょう
subtitles.english: What a troublesome creature we are,

subtitles.original: 人間というのは
subtitles.english: we human beings.

subtitles.original: ハロー　ハワユ
subtitles.english: Hello, how are you?

subtitles.original: ハロー　ハワユ
subtitles.english: Hello, how are you?

subtitles.original: ハロー　ハワユ
subtitles.english: Hello, how are you?

subtitles.original: あなたに　ハロー　ハワユ
subtitles.english: To you, hello, how are you?

subtitles.original: あなたに　ありがとう
subtitles.english: To you, thank you.

subtitles.original: ということで、ハロハワユと、みくみくにしてあげるでしたー！
subtitles.english: So, that was "Halo/How Are You" and "Miku Miku ni Shite Ageru"!

subtitles.original: どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: やっぱね、懐かしさを感じて、涙を流しそうな人もいるんじゃないでしょうか？
subtitles.english: I bet some of you felt nostalgic and were almost moved to tears, right?

subtitles.original: ということでね、このステージに戻ってきましたが、なんだこれ？
subtitles.english: Anyway, I'm back on this stage, but what's this?

subtitles.original: どういうことだ？何を歌うんだ？
subtitles.english: What's going on? What am I going to sing?

subtitles.original: 気になるよね？なんだろうな？王冠が似合いますからね。
subtitles.english: Curious, aren't you? What could it be? The crown really suits me, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: どう？よいしょ。
subtitles.english: How is it? There we go.

subtitles.original: （笑）被ってそうでしょ？
subtitles.english: (Laughs) It looks like it's on, right?

subtitles.original: 絶対王政感あるでしょ？
subtitles.english: I look like an absolute monarch, don't I?

subtitles.original: まあ、あのみんなが予想してるやつではないと思うんですけども。
subtitles.english: Well, I don't think it's the one everyone is expecting, but...

subtitles.original: ということで、早速歌っていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright then, let's get right into the singing!

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen to...

subtitles.original: ワールドイズマイン！
subtitles.english: World is Mine!

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the whole world.

subtitles.original: そういう扱い心得てよね
subtitles.english: Know how to treat me like that, okay?

subtitles.original: よね！
subtitles.english: Got it!

subtitles.original: その一　いつもと違う髪形に気がつくこと
subtitles.english: Rule number one: Notice when my hairstyle is different from usual.

subtitles.original: その二　ちゃんと靴まで見ること　いいね？
subtitles.english: Rule number two: Look all the way down to my shoes. Got it?

subtitles.original: その三　わたしの一言には三つの言葉で返事すること
subtitles.english: Rule number three: Respond to my every word with three of your own.

subtitles.original: わかったら右手がお留守なのをおいなんとかして！
subtitles.english: If you understand, do something about my neglected right hand!

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything.

subtitles.original: キミに心から思ってほしいの　かわいいって
subtitles.english: I just want you to think from the bottom of your heart that I'm cute.

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the whole world.

subtitles.original: 気がついて　ねえねえ
subtitles.english: Notice me, hey, hey.

subtitles.original: 待たせるなんて論外よ
subtitles.english: Making me wait is out of the question.

subtitles.original: わたしを誰だと思ってるの？
subtitles.english: Who do you think I am?

subtitles.original: もうなんだか甘いものが食べたい！
subtitles.english: I really want to eat something sweet right now!

subtitles.original: 今すぐによ
subtitles.english: Right this instant.

subtitles.original: チェックワンツー！
subtitles.english: Check, one, two!

subtitles.original: 欠点？かわいいの間違いでしょ
subtitles.english: Flaws? You must mean "cute".

subtitles.original: 文句は許しませんの
subtitles.english: I won't permit any complaints.

subtitles.original: あのね、わたしの話ちゃんと聞いてる？ちょっと...
subtitles.english: Listen, are you actually listening to what I'm saying? Hey...

subtitles.original: あ、それとね　白いお馬さん決まってるでしょ？
subtitles.english: Oh, and rule... a white horse is already decided, right?

subtitles.original: 迎えに来て
subtitles.english: Come and pick me up.

subtitles.original: わかったら傅いて手を取っておひめさまって
subtitles.english: If you understand, kneel down, take my hand, and call me "Princess".

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything.

subtitles.original: でもね　少しくらい叱ってくれたっていいのよ
subtitles.english: But you know, it's okay if you scold me just a little bit.

subtitles.original: 世界でわたしだけの王子さま
subtitles.english: The prince who belongs only to me in the whole world.

subtitles.original: 気がついて　ほらほら
subtitles.english: Notice me, look, look.

subtitles.original: おててが空いてます
subtitles.english: My hands are empty.

subtitles.original: 無口で無愛想な王子さま
subtitles.english: A silent and unsociable prince.

subtitles.original: もうどうして！　気がついてよ早く
subtitles.english: Gosh, why?! Notice me already!

subtitles.original: オー！
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: 絶対キミはわかってない！
subtitles.english: You definitely don't understand!

subtitles.original: わかってないわ...
subtitles.english: You don't understand...

subtitles.original: いちごの乗ったショートケーキ
subtitles.english: Shortcake with strawberries on top.

subtitles.original: こだわり卵のとろけるプリン
subtitles.english: Melting pudding made with special eggs.

subtitles.original: みんな　みんな　我慢します...
subtitles.english: I'll endure... I'll endure all of them...

subtitles.original: わがままな子だと思わないで
subtitles.english: Don't think of me as a selfish girl.

subtitles.original: わたしだってやればできるの
subtitles.english: I can do it if I try.

subtitles.original: あとで後悔するわよ　やっ！
subtitles.english: You'll regret it later. Yah!

subtitles.original: 当然です！だってわたしは
subtitles.english: Of course! Because I am...

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the whole world.
